data.comment: Today's referee, Rob Dieperink, has blown to start the match.
Yuta Nakayama (Zwolle) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 21, Goal! Jafar Arias gives Venlo a 1-0 lead in Venlo.
Manuel Pherai levels the score at 1-1.
Great play from Kenneth Paal to set up the goal.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
John Stegeman is making the team's first substitution at Covebo Stadion - De Koel with Jesper Drost replacing Manuel Pherai.
In the minute 57, The home team have replaced Arjan Swinkels with Chris Kum. This is the first substitution made today by Hans De Koning.
Mike Van Duinen is on target to give Zwolle a 1-2 advantage.
Sai Van Wermeskerken with an assist there.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Torino Hunte with Joshua John.
Giorgos Giakoumakis gets an equalizer for Venlo. The score is now 2-2.
Chris Kum instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 82, Rico Strieder is replacing Dean Huiberts for Zwolle at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
Clint Leemans is on a sub for Mustafa Saymak for Zwolle.
John Stegeman (Zwolle) is making a fourth substitution, with Samir Lagsir replacing Mike Van Duinen.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
Thomas Lam (Zwolle) has been sent off!
John Stegeman is making the team's fifth substitution at Covebo Stadion - De Koel with Marc Olivier Doue replacing Eliano Reijnders.
